body:
The necromancer girl she revived the man's sick death wife(Misuzu) with that Soseino-hana(Genesis/Spiritual flower)
& the wife was revived by convert into succubus & rape his husband(Misaki) her daughter(Karin) was temporary kill by her own mother
& later convert into succubus as her mom & squeeze him dry till morning. The rest I don't know are they self-awared or mind control with succubus persona.
